foreignData.name: Vorzeichen umdrehen
foreignData.text: Aller Kampfschaden, der dir in diesem Zug zugefügt würde, wird stattdessen einer angreifenden Kreatur deiner Wahl zugefügt.

foreignData.name: Cambiar la suerte
foreignData.text: Todo el daño de combate que se te fuera a hacer este turno, en vez de eso, se le hace a la criatura atacante objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ton arrogance est mon arme la plus redoutable. »
foreignData.name: Retournement de situation
foreignData.text: Toutes les blessures de combat qui devaient vous être infligées ce tour-ci sont infligées à la créature attaquante ciblée à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: "La tua arroganza è la mia arma migliore."
foreignData.name: Ritorci Magia
foreignData.text: Tutto il danno da combattimento che ti verrebbe inflitto in questo turno viene invece inflitto a una creatura attaccante bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: お前の傲慢さが俺の最大の武器だ。
foreignData.name: 形勢逆転
foreignData.text: 攻撃クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、あなたに与えられるすべての戦闘ダメージは、代わりにそれに与えられる。

foreignData.name: Virar as Mesas
foreignData.text: Todo o dano de combate que seria causado a você neste turno, ao invés disso, é causado à criatura alvo atacante.

foreignData.name: 扭转局面
foreignData.text: 本回合中，所有将对你造成的战斗伤害改为对目标进行攻击的生物造成之。

name: Turn the Tables
originalText: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn is dealt to target attacking creature instead.

rulings.text: If the targeted creature isn’t on the battlefield when the combat damage would be dealt, the damage isn’t redirected.
If the targeted creature has been removed from combat but is still on the battlefield, the damage will be redirected.

text: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn is dealt to target attacking creature instead.
